document_data.name: ''Cloak of Protection Versus Evil''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Cloaks of protection versus evil''''' were magic [[cloak]]s  that proved increased defense against evil-aligned creatures.
document_data.Powers: ''Cloaks of protection versus evil'' and their stronger version, ''greater cloaks of protection versus evil'' both gave the wearer enchanted protection of ''+2'' and ''+5'' enchantment respectively.
document_data.History: In the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], the most common source of the ''cloaks of protection versus evil'' came from [[Waterdeep]]. [[Khelben Arunsun]] spent months training one of his student in creation of these cloaks to supply the [[City Watch (Waterdeep)|City Watch]] with defensive and fashionable magic armor. Eventually that apprentice opened a shop where he started experimenting with designs and stiles of the ''cloaks of protection versus evil''.
